title: The Fiend
content: vel 2 Warlock Spell Slot Touch a creature to turn it Invisible. Attacks against it have Disadvantage. It attacks with Advantage. 10 turns Melee Concentration Mirror Image Lvl 2 Illusion ActionLevel 2 Warlock Spell Slot Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself that distract attackers. Each duplicate increases your Armour Class by 3 10 turns Misty Step Lvl 2 Conjuration Bonus ActionLevel 2 Warlock Spell Slot Surround by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. 18m Ray of Enfee
